title: Cold harms bees, impact on honey production

content.question: If an unusually cold summer destroyed a large portion of the bee population, the equilibrium price and quantity of honey produced by bees will most likely change in which of the following ways?

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
